oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Steamer Katie Robbins
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: cotton; riverboats; steamboats;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Sternwheel steamboat Katie Robbins loaded with cotton. The boat was operated by the Parisot Line on the Yazoo River, and sank in 1880 after colliding with a barge. Possibly Coovert #305.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Coovert
